description: Mussaiab Power Station Stage II/ Rehabilitation of  Mussayab Thermal Power Station - Unit-1 / Stage-2

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
1. Scope of work has been changed to rehabilitate of Unit 4 boiler from Unit 1 as requested by MoE.
2. To equip MoE with trained staff to manage the whole power station with spares provided.
3. To rehabilitate  Unit 4 Boiler and connect to National Grid by end June 2012.
4. To complete additional works to improve the capacity and the reliability of Unit 4 by end 2012.
subproject.title: Mussaiab Power Station Stage 2
